scripts.client:dev: npm run client:build && node_modules/.bin/concurrently "npm run client:ts:watch" "npm run client:css:watch"
scripts.client:build: npm run client:clean && npm run client:assets && npm run client:ts:build && npm run client:css:build
scripts.client:assets: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && mkdir -p dist/public/stylesheets/ && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/ dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp -R node_modules/tether/dist/js/ dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp node_modules/eonasdan-bootstrap-datetimepicker/build/js/bootstrap-datetimepicker.min.js dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js dist/public/javascripts/lib/ && cp node_modules/eonasdan-bootstrap-datetimepicker/build/css/bootstrap-datetimepicker.min.css dist/public/stylesheets/ && cp node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css dist/public/stylesheets
scripts.client:css:build: npm run client:css:main && npm run client:css:bootstrap
scripts.server:ts:watch: npm run server:ts:lint && npm run server:ts:clean && node_modules/.bin/tsc --watch
